properties.attr-onclick:
<script>
     function generateOTP(){
         import org.joget.workflow.model.service.*;

 //Generate OTP
 var otp = Math.round(1000 + Math.random() * 9000);

 var otpStr = otp.toString();

 WorkflowManager wm = (WorkflowManager) pluginManager.getBean("workflowManager");
 wm.activityVariable(workflowAssignment.getActivityId(),"status", "Approved");

 wm.activityVariable(workflowAssignment.getActivityId(),"otp", otpStr);

 window.location.href="/jw/web/console/app/trailGameApp/1/userview/builder/v/_/otpValidation"
     }
 </script>

<button class="button" onClick="generateOTP()" >Verify Email</button>
